tools.title: Tools
tools.description: Different tools you can use. The source code for the tools and the website can be found on Github.

randomNumberGenerator.title: Random Number Generator
randomNumberGenerator.description: A random number generator is a process that generates a sequence of random numbers.

aspectRatioCalculator.title: Aspect Ratio Calculator
aspectRatioCalculator.description: The aspect ratio of an image is the ratio of its width to its height, and is expressed with two numbers separated by a colon, such as 16:9, sixteen-to-nine.

passwordGenerator.title: Password Generator
passwordGenerator.description: The password generator creates random passwords based on parameters set by you.

value.title: Value
value.description: The result of multiplying the percentage and the base value divided by 100 is the percentage value.

percentage.title: Percentage
percentage.description: The percentage is obtained by dividing the percentage value by the base value and then multiplying by 100%.

baseValue.title: Base Value
baseValue.description: The base value is obtained by dividing the percentage value by the percentage and then multiplying by 100.

percentageChange.title: Percentage Change
percentageChange.description: The percentage change equals the change in value divided by the absolute value of the original value, multiplied by 100.

baseValueChange.title: Base Value Change
baseValueChange.description: The change in the base value corresponds to the addition, subtraction, multiplication or division of the percentage with the base value.
